title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Limitation on indebtedness; liability of Board members; deficits in sinking fund to be included in budget estimates; authority of Council to borrow from Secretary of Treasury; repayment; bonds guaranteed by United States. [Repealed]
